unnormalised: Okay, folks, buckle up! Traffic's about to get a little different. The Bengaluru Traffic Police just announced some changes that'll affect your daily commute, especially around Electronic City and Whitefield.
normalised: Okay, folks, buckle up! Traffic's about to get a little different. The Bengaluru Traffic Police just announced some changes that'll affect your daily commute, especially around Electronic City and Whitefield.

unnormalised: Apparently, they're cracking down on lane discipline – no more weaving in and out like you're cooking biryani! Expect heavier fines, maybe even a court summons, if you're caught.
normalised: Apparently, they're cracking down on lane discipline – no more weaving in and out like you're cooking biryani! Expect heavier fines, maybe even a court summons, if you're caught.

unnormalised: New rules are also being implemented near the Manyata Tech Park and Koramangala areas. Officials say this is all aimed at easing congestion, especially with Onam around the corner and everyone heading home.
normalised: New rules are also being implemented near the Manyata Tech Park and Koramangala areas. Officials say this is all aimed at easing congestion, especially with Onam around the corner and everyone heading home.

unnormalised: They're also finally addressing those notorious signal timings on Hosur Road. Let's hope they actually work!
normalised: They're also finally addressing those notorious signal timings on Hosur Road. Let's hope they actually work!

unnormalised: The changes will come into effect from next week, the 15th of August. So, take note, drivers!
normalised: The changes will come into effect from next week, the fifteenth of August. So, take note, drivers!

unnormalised: Remember, folks, a smooth ride means a faster ride. Rs. 5000 fine ain't worth saving 5 minutes!
normalised: Remember, folks, a smooth ride means a faster ride. Rupee five thousand fine ain't worth saving five minutes!

unnormalised: Also, be prepared for increased patrolling and maybe even some surprise checks by the cops. Drive safe, and Happy Onam! Keep a distance of at least 200 metres from the vehicle ahead.
normalised: Also, be prepared for increased patrolling and maybe even some surprise checks by the cops. Drive safe, and Happy Onam! Keep a distance of at least two hundred meters from the vehicle ahead.
